Hi Tama,

Welcome aboard! I'm glad you are finally posting. It's always good to 
have Japanese member on board! It is always a pleasure to have 
an "insider"... I hope you enjoy your stay with us.

~wounds

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, ktamae@a... wrote:
> Hello everyone!
> I'm a Japanese SHQ member who have just read your comments till 
now, and 
> filnaly I try to post for the first time. 
> As I'm now in abroad I haven't any books about Shinsengumi with me, 
so I 
> could give only limited informations, nevertheless I 'd like to 
contribute to your 
> research.
> I mention also that I became a big fan of NHK drama "Shinsengumi " 
this year 
> and my interest in Shinsengumi increased.
> 
> Sincerely yours
> 
> Tama
